examples.title: Locaties voor een programma
examples.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?locationName WHERE {
  <http://data.rdlabs.beeldengeluid.nl/id/program/2101608040029461531> schema:location ?location . 
  ?location skos:prefLabel ?locationName
} 
LIMIT 10

examples.title: PErsonen voor een programma
Programma's voor een persoon
examples.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX gtaa: <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/gtaa/>

select DISTINCT ?person ?personName where {
  ?programId a schema:CreativeWork . ?programId (schema:about|schema:mentions|schema:creator|schema:contributor|schema:actor|schema:crew|schema:performer)/(schema:about|schema:mentions|schema:creator|schema:contributor|schema:actor|schema:crew|schema:performer) gtaa:126347 .
  ?programId (schema:about|schema:mentions|schema:creator|schema:contributor|schema:actor|schema:crew|schema:performer)/(schema:about|schema:mentions|schema:creator|schema:contributor|schema:actor|schema:crew|schema:performer) ?person .
  ?person skos:prefLabel ?personName . FILTER(?person != gtaa:126347)
}

examples.title: Onderwerpen voor een persoon
examples.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?keyword
WHERE {
?s (schema:about|schema:mentions|schema:creator|schema:contributor|schema:actor|schema:crew|schema:performer)/(schema:about|schema:mentions|schema:creator|schema:contributor|schema:actor|schema:crew|schema:performer) ?personId .
  ?personId skos:prefLabel "Bouwman, Mies"@nl . ?s schema:about ?subjectIri . 
  ?subjectIri skos:prefLabel ?keyword 
}
